Metadata: Workshop proceedings: NOAA center for coastal ecosystem health coastal management services scoping workshop

This workshop brought together 37 coastal management experts, practitioners and academics in an effort to provide NOAA leadership with a clear set of recommendations on how NOAA could provide an effective Coastal Management Service (CMS). After two and a half days of work, the group produced two reports outlining a series of recommendations​, ranging from general to specific, which are summarized here.
